entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.4°C
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
